episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a variety of intriguing topics, including the gradual lengthening of Earth's days, a historical ban on mustaches in Dublin, the sound barrier-breaking capabilities of Diplodocus tails, and the increasing use of positive adjectives in scientific papers.

facts.fact: My fact is, tomorrow will be the longest day of your life.
My fact this week is that in 1457, men with mustaches were banned from Dublin.
My fact this week is that Diplodocuses could break the sound barrier.
My fact is that more and more scientists are describing their findings as astounding.
